Title: Snackers
Writer: Dana Scanlon, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dominic Dierkes (story), Sean Clements (story)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Jillian Bell
Plot: The office holds an election to decide who's in charge of breakroom snacks.
